website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you're looking for an easy, less messy tie-dye process; but it's not as effective as multi-step tie-dye kits.
pros: Offers a unique application process that allows users to dip, spray, or paint on premixed colors and set with heat source (dryer or iron)
Easier to use and less messy than traditional tie-dye kits
Comes with a book of ideas
cons: The downside of the easy color process is that the dye doesn't always saturate the material, leaving blotches

customer_reviews.title: Product is not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually leave reviews, but this product was terrible. I tie dye regularly, I’m not new to it. I purchased the camo kit because my brother requested those colors specifically. I followed all instructions as given in the insert. As you can tell, the colors do not stick, nor do they look camo once set. The bottles were spray bottles, another downside. I am beyond disappointed and will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Gianne

customer_reviews.title: Messy but fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product very easy to use. Colors came out bright and only faded a tiny bit after washing. I was able to do 10 masks with a little more than half of each bottle. The only reason I’m dropping a star is because it does drip a little which makes it pretty messy. Easy to clean up on the table, but poses a risk to the clothes you are wearing. Overall I would (and probably will) buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa P-E

customer_reviews.title: Kid friendly and vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: We used this dye kit along with some rit dye (the dark blue and purple) the colors of this set were vibrant and the spray bottles made it easy for the kids to use! It also didn’t stain their hands like the rit dye, I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie S

customer_reviews.title: This works best for me
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with this product. I had Halloween shirts in mind, when I bought it. I was drawn to this option for the heat setting. I have a heat press. So it made this so much easier than traditional tie dye. The spray portion was great for where I wanted splotches at. But I ended up taking a paint brush and painting the marks on the other areas. Just so I could be certain where the dye was going. Overall, I’ve been extremely pleased with my purchase, and have other shirts I’m currently doing with the dye.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these colors!! They are very bright and fun! My thirteen year old daughter started a tie dying business and these colors were amazing! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best dye!
customer_reviews.text: This dye is the absolute easiest to use!! And it’s clean, no gloves required. I can get about three adult tanks out of one package of dye. I’ve found for best results to let the dye set for 48 hours before washing. I’ve gone through multiple packages of the neon. Haven’t tried any others
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: I prefer traditional tie dye but my kids loves using the spray bottles! It does make a lot of shirts! We bought three three pack as and made 13 shirts. We still have a lot of dye left. After the completing all the steps, you can wash the shirts. They faded a little bit but not too bad. The kids love the process. Don't be fooled! It's still really messy.
customer_reviews.author: Marz

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I was super disappointed. The colors are great (neon) but the application was bad. The sprays got clogged right away. I dyed a hoodie using the twirl method and even though the hoodie was damp, the dye never seeped through. The basically only died the sleeves. I went in an sprayed the rest of the hoodie without rubber bands and I sort of hate how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: hellorachael

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE & AWESOME RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT DYE! So easy to use! And so much less mess than dip dyeing. The colors are vibrant and they set extremely well — there was *zero* dilution in the wash and none of the colors ran. I achieved all the colors shown here with just the primary color set (red, yellow, blue). The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars was because the spray bottle for the red dye was janky and didn’t spray properly, so I had trouble getting the dye to go where I wanted it. But I would definitely recommend this product and plan to purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Porte

customer_reviews.title: Not the most kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my 3 year old and I to make some shirts. The spray is a bit less messy than traditional method but it is actually quite difficult to spray repeatedly and my daughter couldn’t get it to spray at all. I didn’t think about how she may not have the finger strength for that yet! I ended up doing most of the spraying and then we took the tops off and dumped the remaining color over the undyed portions. I do wish we had gotten the regular old squirt bottles because it ended up being a giant mess but we did have fun doing it.
customer_reviews.author: KORTNY

customer_reviews.title: Fades
customer_reviews.text: I used this to dye a jacket, and the blue faded a lot after being put in the dryer, even though I tried to saturate the fabric and used the whole bottle of dye. The purple only faded a little bit, though. I'm a bit disappointed, but it was easy to use. Update** It fades even more when you wash it. I even washed in cold water. I can barely even see the blue anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Selene

customer_reviews.title: Not enough/hard to spray
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright colors that can make a total of 6 colors when mixed. HOWEVER, it says that it would make 12 shirts but I don't see how that's possible. We bought a pack of 8 little kid shirts and it was barely enough. Also, if you're buying this as something to do WITH your kids - you'll do all the work as the bottles are not made for the little hands. Very hard to spray. Otherwise, pretty, good quality, just not for the amount of shirts it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: Egle

customer_reviews.title: Recommend, fun for kids!!
customer_reviews.text: These were so fun for my kids to help with! They loved spraying their shirts and the colors have lasted through several washes with no color fade yet!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Just bought another set in different colors. Very easy to use. Colors are extremely vibrant. I did 3 pairs of socks and used about half of each bottle. THIS IS NOT LIKE NORMAL TIE DYE so even if you are experienced make sure you follow the directions (they even show you how to do different patterns). For smaller items this product is great. For larger items I would get a more traditional type of dye.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for making tie-dyes with children
customer_reviews.text: This was excellent. Had a birthday party with kids ages 5-9 and due to other reviews, bought four boxes to serve about 15 kids. There was PLENTY left over. Kids found the squirt bottles easy to use; no messes from spilled dye. Kids squirted a bit on themselves and the mom was thrilled to find out it washed out. The shirts were dried on a clothesline, then dried to set the dye, in a clothes dryer. The painted shirts have been worn a great deal; washed then dried on a clothesline, and a month later, remain vibrant. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Our family does a tie dye day every year. We are pretty good at it and turn out some really pretty shirts. We have always used the Tulip dyes . This year I ordered two S E I kits to change things up a little. What a disappointment. The color washed out during the rinsing process and we ended up with12 ruined shirts
customer_reviews.author: Judith D

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: This product colors are very vibrant. Super pretty. Only think I didn't like is it is a spray on. I ended up dumping it on my item. Spraying wouldn't have penetrated all the layers of the dress I was trying to dye. I did order another just to add more.
customer_reviews.author: Acemom180

customer_reviews.title: Great for stencils
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize these were spray bottles. Not great for traditional tye dye, but makes beautiful stencils!
customer_reviews.author: Kailey Galanis

customer_reviews.title: Super easy Tie Dye Kit... Anyone can do it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use! Great idea for DIY tie dye clothes with the kids! Everyone loved our pieces! Even after a wash the were still bold.
customer_reviews.author: MommaB

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun product! Definitely will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: These were SO AMAZING! My kiddo and I had a ton of fun making shirts with these tie-dye sprays! They are so simple to use. No special process, products or accessories needed! You literally just spray them onto the shirt. No mess, as long as you put something underneath the shirts when you spray them. Washes right off your hands with surfaces with soap and water. After they're dry, you iron them to set the colors in, and it stays permanently! No running in the wash (or the sprinkler in the yard, in our case). HIGHLY recommended as a quarantine activity!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would never recommend...spray tie dye
customer_reviews.text: Would never recommend this product to tie due anything. Not sure if this company knows how to tie dye. Accidentally bought but still tried to use. Spraying shirt does not soak through at all. Barely gets anywhere. Some reviews said might be good to soak shirt before use. Might work better. Had to end up pouring liquid on to shirts to get any color anywhere. Barely covered 4 shirts. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Torrano

customer_reviews.title: Bad! Rinses out almost completely
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed and sprayed and sprayed until I had a pattern that looked good. I used almost all three bottles on a single medium men’s hoodie (cotton) because I wanted a good color payout. I left the damp hoodie outside until it dried in the sun, then brought it inside and tumbled it in a hot dryer for around twenty minutes. I’ve washed it two or three times in cool water now, and there are only very faint stains in the fabric from this dye. What a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: Don’t make your shirt /pants too damp with water like in a lot of videos. The die will bleed while it dries and your beautiful design may fade and become something else by morning.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaFruitGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These colors are great. It was my first time tie dying this way and I now think I over sprayed because it’s more orange than pink and yellow. Lol oops. Rookie mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: So totally excellent
customer_reviews.text: Made tie-dyed tshirts for a kid's birthday party. There was no mess, easy clean up. Kids loved and parents even asked for a shirt to join in the fun. I had 20 kids, so I ordered 9 bottles, expecting to run out. There is PLENTY left over and the colour is STILL vibrant after 50+ washings and being dried outside in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty colors..don’t wash off..
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use,colors are amazing...we made 6 x large tee shirt,6 little boy tee shirt..6 white face mask for family..and still have pink left..that’s fun
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Hard to control the spray to one spot. I had quite a few shirts done. Did not like the ironing part, but I bought it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pevalina

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors! My only issue is the spray bottles they came in were hard to control where the dye was going. It would have been easier to put it in a squeeze bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It's was the crapest tie dye stuff u can bye.. not only was they not enough dye to do 2 shirts but after letting it sit for 3 days all the dye washed out... Hate I even wasted my money. Also after requesting a refund the seller wouldn't give me one unless I sent it back ummm hello I used it it was crappy the bottles that was empty went in trash so send what back?
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Davis

customer_reviews.title: I was impressed with how easy it was to tie dye with these sprays
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how easy it was to tie dye with these sprays. I used foam sticky letters prior to tie dying and then removed them. The shirts turned out so cute. My only complaint is that a couple of times the bottles clogged and then came out more as a spatter and was very messy. This didn't ruin the look of the shirts at all though.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Kids had a great time tie dying masks and t shirts. Easy to use, a little thin, but a fun summer project during lockdown
customer_reviews.author: Cory Bones

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize when I purchased that they were spray on, pleasantly surprised. Love the colors, super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeedd!! Worked so well! Cute colors I’m 25 and perfect for corona quarantine busyness!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: As seen in the pictures we had the shirts completely covered front and back and when we opened them there was no color! We had to just spray them open and make our own pattern. When we did that it was barely enough for three shirts. I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mertens

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, spray bottles were difficult to pump
customer_reviews.text: This tie dye set wasn’t terrible, but not the best. I got this for my daughter and her girlfriend when they had a sleepover. The colors turned out really pretty. The only complaint I had was the spray bottles were difficult to maneuver and would frequently get stuck, so I feel like they didn’t get to do as much of the fun part.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: It was hard to use for a beginner like me
customer_reviews.text: I loved the colors, but did not care for the spray bottle design. It was hard to get into the cracks of the shirt and was a little messy. Maybe I did not use the proper technique or I just didn’t know what I was doing lol! Hopefully it works for other people though!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors but it comes in spray bottle not a squirt Bottle like I have had before.
customer_reviews.author: stew

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are spray bottles similar to perfume bottles. It made it difficult to use when using a design for the tie dye. Also the color did not hold well. Would not purchase again. the colors are really bright and pretty though- they just do not hold on the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I don’t love the look it’s very very light & I can’t see how the spray can do up to 12 shirts.. I feel like I’ve used half of the bottles already and it was on one white shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this kit! So easy and fun! My 3 year old and 10 year old enjoyed making shirts and hats with this product!
customer_reviews.author: WMC3

customer_reviews.title: Takes practice to get right compared to other dyes
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product on multiple occasions. Overall it has worked, but I had problems with the dye staying in the shirts compared to other dyes. For its price I’d expect it to be a little more consistent, but it’s definitely not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN MINGO

customer_reviews.title: Spray bottle not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The color is good, but the spray bottle is NOT easy to use. Traditional tie dye bottle is much better and easier
customer_reviews.author: Will V.

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I thought.
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying to tie dye with this product its awful. I reminds me of fingernail polish. Stays sticky of fabric for quite a while. Would never repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Brewer

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It was very weird to use this due because it’s different from the others and mines wasn’t good when it came out.
customer_reviews.author: Maylee

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and easy for teens to use by themselves!
customer_reviews.author: BS Lester

customer_reviews.title: Dye washed out immediately
customer_reviews.text: Colors all wash out. Very sad watching it all go down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Pants

customer_reviews.title: Spray bottle =  awesome effect
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Easy to use, bright color, spray bottle is awesome and makes it super easy. instructions are easy to understand. I will buy this again next time I tie dye. on wet fabric the colors blended together nicely and on dry fabric I sprayed with lightest color first, let dry, then used darker color. turned out so cool!
customer_reviews.author: Corey L

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute!
customer_reviews.text: So fun!!! The spray is pretty messy but it worked great and our shirts look really cute!!
customer_reviews.author: psquare

customer_reviews.title: Take me back to the 60s
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun bonding with the friends and family and a good quality paint.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette M. Millner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it you can only do like two shirts not 10-12 like it says.
customer_reviews.author: Tilton

customer_reviews.title: Color doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The color 90% washed out of the shirt I made when I was done.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: used for tie dying with 8 year olds. A lot less mess and colors were good. It doesn't saturate has much as the regular method but still worked. Just required more spraying.
customer_reviews.author: BRIGITTE

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright in colors and super easy to use. I will buy again in the other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The spray design just gets the dye everything and it’s hard to control where you’re spraying. If you going for a design or pattern the spray containers are useless because the dye doesn’t go through all the fabric so it stays mostly white.
customer_reviews.author: blank

customer_reviews.title: Easy product to use!
customer_reviews.text: We used this product, followed directions with heat set, then washed after a few wears and the color didn’t fade at all. The spray nozzle was a little tough to manage. Would suggest putting the die in another bottle. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T EVEN DYE YOUR FABRIC!
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying that I am an avid tie dyer. This product is awful. I had high hopes when dying, but my pieces ended up completely white. I re-dyed some pieces and let them sit for an entire 7 days. Still turned out white. Do not waste your money on this dye brand! 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most of the color washed off in the wash
customer_reviews.text: Worked for its purpose but most of the dye came out in the wash
customer_reviews.author: Alyshia

customer_reviews.title: Cute colors
customer_reviews.text: Cute little set, the spray bottle were difficult at first but our shirts turned out cute
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: These were ok... I was only able to make 2 shirts out of this liquid so if you want to make more than that purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: used the "scrunch" method as recommended and it turned out great! Better than the normal way to tie dye because you have more control.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Everwood

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use for tie dye. Just make sure to follow directions. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: sheryl ballengee

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was worth the purchase. I've made three shirts already. However, the green bottle's spray cap was broken before I used it, but I fixed that transfering the dye to another spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: So We tie dyed a plain white cooking apron and I think it turned out amazingly! This is my first ever experience using tie dye and it was an extremely pleasant experience. 1 apron used hardly any product so the value is really good! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Dye doesn’t stick unless clothes are completely dry
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this product. We followed the Instructions, but the shirts weren’t completely dry and the dye washed out. The spray bottles didn’t spray well or saturate the fabric well, so we ended up just dumping the dye on the shirts.
customer_reviews.author: anila fikri

customer_reviews.title: This does not make 18 shirts! But it was fun and easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use and clean up the colors blended nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle customer

customer_reviews.title: Color washed out
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with this item. The colors looked so great in the bottle and once they were on the fabric. It immediately washed out even after I followed all of the aftercare instructions. Because it was a spray bottle it would also come out spotty. Just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works great
customer_reviews.text: This tie dye kit did its overall job. There is an easy application and easy to follow directions. The color stays on. I do recommend this product if you're not planing on tie dying a lot of clothing for one kit. However, if you are planning to dye a lot of clothes, buy some more of these kits but in a variety of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Left paint on overnight to set. The colors looked great until we washed them..... all gone down the drain. The white t-shirts we tie dyed will be tie dyed again. Very little sign of designs was left behind. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun project. One spray didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: One of the sprays didn’t work so we had to switch them around to use all the colors. Kids had fun spraying masks and tanks.
customer_reviews.author: erin scoggins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT TIE SHIRTS, ETC TIGHTLY. Colors do not soak through well, but are vibrant
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Color washed off
customer_reviews.text: Wrapped it up in plastic and waited 6 hours before washing it... color washed off!
customer_reviews.author: Deo Melgaco

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product I tie-dye shirts, hats, capri pants I ordered another set in a different color great product.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA GOULD

customer_reviews.title: DYE WASHES OUT COMPLETELY
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy. Dye washed out completely even after rinsing in cold water, which is a shame because the sweatshirt looked awesome when the rubber bands were removed. It only made 3.5 shirts too. Such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: rochelle alzfan

customer_reviews.title: Easy but not a great value.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use But it doesn’t get you very far though only was able to tie-dye one top and pants. Looks neon when it goes on but upon washing dries to pastel.
customer_reviews.author: ECT

customer_reviews.title: Worst tie dye kit
customer_reviews.text: Worst tie dye kit I’ve ever used. Incredibly difficult to work with and is insanely hard to get to a drying point. Rit dye is a much better alternative. Stains everything.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Spray bottle damaged
customer_reviews.text: Spray bottle came damaged when I tried to use on my product it looks awful not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nope, not today!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible.... this is definitely not going to give u a bright, full color on even one shirt much less as many as it advertised. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Washed off
customer_reviews.text: Used this product on multiple pieces of clothing. Followed instructions to a T and everything washed off. Is it not meant to be permanent?
customer_reviews.author: Juan Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Colors did not stick - washed the sweat shirt after dying and it all faded A LOT. I let sit for 24 hours as well. Also - got two sweatshirts out of this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Had to use most of the kit to get good coverage on 1 shirt, but the color stuck very well
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Love these colors!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with these colors together and so were the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Comes in spray bottles... it gets more on your hands than on the shirt you’re trying to make
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Spray bottles are more difficult to use than traditional dye. Also I followed directions and 90% of the dye washed out in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: The spray is honestly kinda annoying but this color set is so pretty. I did a sunset duvet with it
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as advertised. Fun with kiddos. We'll be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Duska Dollar

customer_reviews.title: This dyed really light for the amount I put on ...
customer_reviews.text: This dyed really light for the amount I put on. However, it is cheaper than most I have seen. We did 3 adult shirts and had some left over, but if I had known it dyed light, I would have used a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fades away with one wash
customer_reviews.text: Tye dye washes out SOOOOO easy. Looks cool at first. Doesn’t last. Way too expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Great results but not enough product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the results, but only had enough to do the front of ONE shirt! The advertisement states there's enough to do eight shirts. NO WAY! If the contents were about 4 times the size, then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Order more than one!
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I have to say is order more than one! They go quick. We love how our hoodies turned out though :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: kinda neat how its applied. i liked the colors and recieved the item faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with great results
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this kit! It’s fun to work with and very easy to get great results.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not worth iy
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions and none of the shirts came out right still
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Colors don’t stick
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t recommend this.. most of the color washed away the first time I washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use.. didn't stain my white table or clothes.. lots super awesome! I tied died everythinggggg
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: so Perfect! This product is great and so is their customer service! Will order again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: kaytlin nicholson

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I need to repair something that accidentally was bleached. It works like a charm. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lois J. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: not so great
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and pretty at first but washes out alot after first wash
customer_reviews.author: Corey L

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected in every way!
customer_reviews.text: The tie dye kit was so fun to work with. We dyed shirts with our grandchildren and they loved them. After they were dry we dried them in a hot dryer and they have been successfully washed several times. I was amazed how quickly the product arrived and how easy and fun it was to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sid Thatcher

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too messy.
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to use as I had hoped. The spray went everywhere. Fortunately, I was spraying inside the washer, so it didn't go all over the walls. I ended up ordering a Tulip kit and like that MUCH better. Also, these stained the "tower" agitator plastic, and I'm still trying to get that off a month later.
customer_reviews.author: Eco Shopper

product_meta.title: S·E·I SEI 10118 Tumble Dye Craft & Fabric Tie Dye Kit 2oz 3/Pkg-Girly Girl
product_meta.description: Color:GirlyThe easiest way to Tie Dye! Tie Dye Kits comes pre-mixed and ready to use. No mixing with salts, soda ash, or hot water. Simply shake well and spray! Dye is water based, non-toxic, and extremely easy to clean up. Colors remain bright and vibrant after repeated washings. Works well with stencils. Kit contains 3 colors and dyes up to 6-12 shirts depending on the tie dye method used. Kit includes an idea book with step by step instructions and detailed pictures. Once the project is complete, let air dry completely and heat set the color by ironing or putting in the clothes dry on high heat for 30 minutes. Great fabric dye for t-shirts, sweatshirts, shoes, pants, pillowcases, sheets, blankets, and a variety of home decor projects! Assembled in the USA.
